channel.title: Axoloti at NIME 2018
channel.description: Hello, I hope to meet other axoloti users at the New Interfaces for Musical Expression (NIME) conference in Blacksburg, VA (June 3-6). I'll be performing a piece using an axoloti-based effects pedal (Concert 1), and presenting a short paper/poster titled "Using the Axoloti Embedded Sound Processing Platform to Foster Experimentation and Creativity" (Demo-Poster session 2). Let me know if you are going, All best, Jean-Francois.

item.title: Axoloti at NIME 2018
item.dc:creator: @da3v Dave Casey
item.description:
@da3v wrote:

...and health issues are not permitting.
Maybe NIME2019?

item.title: Axoloti at NIME 2018
item.dc:creator: @da3v Dave Casey
item.description:
@da3v wrote:

I tentatively plan to be there, health issues permitting. I'll attempt to bring my Linnnstrument-Axoloti setup (TSG's MPE Buzz is still, by far, my favorite output.)

item.title: Axoloti at NIME 2018
item.dc:creator: @jfcharles Jean-Francois Charles
item.description:
@jfcharles wrote:

Hello,
I hope to meet other axoloti users at the New Interfaces for Musical Expression (NIME) conference in Blacksburg, VA (June 3-6).
I'll be performing a piece using an axoloti-based effects pedal (Concert 1), and presenting a short paper/poster titled "Using the Axoloti Embedded Sound Processing Platform to Foster Experimentation and Creativity" (Demo-Poster session 2).
Let me know if you are going,
All best,
Jean-Francois.
